00169    // inline methods 
00170  
00171     
00172    inline double TanhCosineExternal::energy(double d, int type) const
00173    {
00174       double perpLength_, q_, clipParameter_, arg, clipcos;
00175       Vector lengths_;
00176       lengths_ = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
00177       perpLength_ = lengths_[perpDirection_];
00178       q_ = (2.0*M_PI*periodicity_)/perpLength_;
00179       clipParameter_   = 1.0/(q_*width_*perpLength_);
00180 
00181       arg = q_*d;
00182       clipcos = clipParameter_*cos(arg);
00183       
00184       return prefactor_[type]*externalParameter_*tanh(clipcos);
00185    }
00186    
00187    /* 
00188    * Calculate external potential energy for a single atom.
00189    */
00190    inline 
00191    double TanhCosineExternal::energy(const Vector& position, int type) const
00192    {
00193       double d, totalEnergy;
00194       totalEnergy = 0.0;
00195       d = position[perpDirection_];
00196       totalEnergy += energy(d, type);
00197       
00198       return totalEnergy;
00199    }
00200   
00201    /* 
00202    * Calculate force for a particle as a function of distance to boundary.
00203    */
00204    inline double TanhCosineExternal::forceScalar(double d, int type) const
00205    {
00206       double perpLength_, q_, clipParameter_, arg, clipcos, tanH, sechSq;
00207       Vector lengths_;
00208       lengths_ = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
00209       perpLength_ = lengths_[perpDirection_];
00210       q_ = (2.0*M_PI*periodicity_)/perpLength_;
00211       clipParameter_   = 1.0/(q_*width_*perpLength_);
00212       arg = q_*d;
00213       clipcos = clipParameter_*cos(arg);
00214       tanH = tanh(clipcos);
00215       sechSq = (1.0 - tanH*tanH);
00216       return prefactor_[type]*externalParameter_*sechSq*clipParameter_*sin(arg)*q_;
00217    }
00218 
00219    /* 
00220    * Calculate external force for a single atom.
00221    */
00222    inline 
00223    void TanhCosineExternal::getForce(const Vector& position, int type, 
00224                                      Vector& force) const
00225    {
00226       double d = position[perpDirection_];
00227       double scalarf;
00228       force.zero();
00229       scalarf = forceScalar(d, type);
00230       force[perpDirection_] = scalarf;
00231       
00232    }
